They are also working on enhancing core functionality by overriding model endpoints, removing unnecessary logs and clients from default tate, and refining documentation in their codebase.

pull_requests.title: move code out to plugins, adapters and clients
pull_requests.body:
Major breaking code change. Please thoroughly review.

This PR moves everything into packages. Plugins, adapters, clients. Adds some complexity to seeing all the code but dramatically reduces complexity of contributing code. Also enables browser-based eliza.

pull_requests.title: lazy load llama
pull_requests.body: Lazy loads llama from llama.ts so we don't try to install it immediately.

opened.title: Squash postgres migrations
opened.body: We have some postgres migrations-- I can't remember it we need these, but since we're greenfield it will reduce complexity greatly for setting up postgres for the first time if it just works and there is no need to setup or migrate.

opened.title: Unify ImageGen into ModelClass.IMAGE
opened.body: We have an ImageGen type but this should really be extended to a ModelClass type, since it is available for almost every major provider.

opened.title: Move services to plugins
opened.body:
After moving everything into plugins that is obvious, the only thing left really that is keeping core from being lightweight and running entirely in the browser or other environments like cloudflare are the native dependency on services.

We should probably move the node-only services into a plugin-node which can then be depended upon by other services, for example discord.

We should have a service registration and locator system, similar to the other plugin registrations.

They have also been addressing issues related to environment configuration and build failures while making significant updates to TypeScript configurations across various code areas in packages and core modules.

pull_requests.title: plugin-image-generation tsconfig.json fix & ollama error handling
models.gguf stored in models file, & tsconfig changes for ref @eliza/core & other things
Add OLLAMA as Model Provider
pull_requests.body:
# Relates to:

(https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/69)


# Risks

OLLAMA Provider parts low risk
medium risk how the dependency ollama-ai-provider was added
llama.ts delegating to LlamaCppService or OllamaService high risk (because it was was crashing nodemon so wip but still a change that might be good to look at) 

# Background

## adds Ollama Model Provider

## also code for switching LOCALLLAMA providers (might be good to have for local embeddings use cases & when using local for other tasks but still using other model providers)

# Documentation changes needed?

All documentation needed is in the .env file. Did not update the readme. but i can if needed

# Testing

run with a OLLAMA_MODEL defined to something & the OLLAMA_EMBEDDING_MODEL set to something

opened.title: twitter folder paths for twitter cookies & cache/last tweet point to different places
opened.body:
the cache is not being picked up. the twitter cookies is.
two solutions:
set cache to same folder path as cookies. 
or use recursive find the lowest twittercache folder found

comments.author: o-on-x
comments.body: twitter cache pointing to current directory only rather than searching up till find

opened.title: .env is not being loaded or picked up in settings
agent & plugin-image-generation failed to build
opened.body:
```
> eliza@ build /home/ooo/apps/elizaos_eliza/work/latest_clone/eliza
> bash ./scripts/build.sh

Building package: agent

> @eliza/agent@0.0.1 build
> tsup --format esm --dts

No input files, try "tsup <your-file>" instead
Failed to build agent

...

Building package: plugin-image-generation
> @eliza/plugin-image-generation@0.0.1 build
> tsup --format esm --dts

DTS Build start
src/index.ts(8,8): error TS2307: Cannot find module '@eliza/core' or its corresponding type declarations.
src/index.ts(9,29): error TS2307: Cannot find module '@eliza/core' or its corresponding type declarations.

Error: error occurred in dts build
    at Worker.<anonymous> (/home/ooo/apps/elizaos_eliza/work/latest_clone/eliza/node_modules/tsup/dist/index.js:1541:26)
    at Worker.emit (node:events:507:28)
    at MessagePort.<anonymous> (node:internal/worker:267:53)
    at [nodejs.internal.kHybridDispatch] (node:internal/event_target:827:20)
    at MessagePort.<anonymous> (node:internal/per_context/messageport:23:28)
DTS Build error
Failed to build plugin-image-generation
```
